Acute otitis externa common inflammatory condition external auditory canal often associate infection , allergy dermatitis . The active ingredient novel dexamethasone suspension identical concentration route administration steroid component approve drug Ciprodex , currently widely-prescribed dexamethasone-containing agent treatment acute otitis externa . We enroll 60 patient ( 30 two separate treatment group ) trial . All patient elect participate study receive either FST-201 Ciprodex . FST-201 Ciprodex mask provided free charge study participant . Patients follow least 15 day ear inflammation either resolve determined need additional intervention . The study conduct attention relevant GCP , ICH , FDA , HIPPA Declaration Helsinki guideline .
